text: Hagi anama hute'za Livae naga'mo'za zamagra'a sipisipi afutamine, pristi vahe'mokizmi sipisipi afutamina retrotra hu'naze. Na'ankure pristi vahera, Aroni amohe'za kre fananemahu ofane, afova'anena Kresramana nevazageno vuno hani ome hu'ne. E'ina hu'negu hu'za Livae naga'mo'za zamagra'a sipisipi afutamine, pristi vahe'mokizmi sipisipi afutaminena retrotra hu'naze.
